title: How much of an influence did country have on grunge (music, genre, style, instruments, recording, artist)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only an indirect influence, due to rock itself coming in part from country music. But no direct influence. Grunge came out of the punk scene, when bands started flirting with 70’s hard rock/metal and 60’s garage and psychedelia. Later the original grunge bands influenced subsequent generations. Country wasn’t a factor in the genesis of grunge music.
